mapper.insert: insert into question(product_id, member_id, title, content, private_question, qstate, rdate) values(${product_id}, ${member_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{private_question}, #{qstate}, now())
mapper.select: select q.*, m.nickname as renteeNickname from question as q join member as m on q.member_id = m.member_id where q.product_id = #{product_id} order by q.rdate desc limit #{limitStart}, 10
mapper.update: update question set qstate = b'1' where question_id = #{question_id}
